author: Christianna Silva
title: The Coronavirus Is Changing How Activists Fight
description: activists have shifted their techniques so that they can still bring productive change for LGBTQ+ rights, the climate crisis, and online privacy in a time when going outside in large groups of people is frowned upon at best and deadly at worst.
content:
When many people think about activism, theyre likely envisioning its most visible component: People emerging from the comfort of their homes to physically gather together and make their voices heard.
Those protests and rallies have established themselves as … [+7334 chars]
